peril.model.states

Class Reinforce

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • peril.model.states.ModelState
        • peril.model.states.Reinforce

  • public final class Reinforce
extends ModelState
    The logic for the ModelState where the current ModelPlayer can select one of their ModelCountrys and reinforce the ModelCountry's ModelArmy with ModelUnit(s).
    Since:
    2018-03-15
    Version:
    1.01.03
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    ModelState

      void reinforce()
      Reinforces the currently selected ModelCountry.
      boolean select(ModelCountry country)
      During Reinforce only one ModelCountry can be selected at once and that ModelCountry most be ruled by the current ModelPlayer as specified by GameController.getCurrentModelPlayer().

      • select

        public boolean select(ModelCountry country)
        During Reinforce only one ModelCountry can be selected at once and that ModelCountry most be ruled by the current ModelPlayer as specified by GameController.getCurrentModelPlayer().
        Specified by:
        select in class ModelState
        Parameters:
        country - The ModelCountry that can be selected.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the specified ModelCountry has been selected by this ModelState.
